description:
Use Smartlook to get analytics and records session on website to improve your website.

By default, no sensitive data is recorded.

Smartlook have other APIs functionalities , you can tell me if you wish me to add features to this plugin here : www.joapp.ca/request
name: Smartlook
plugin_instructions:
When the setup is complete, this plugin will work on all pages of the app. To setup this plugin, you must :
1. Log in your Smartlook account (If you do not have one, register to a free or paid plan on www.smartlook.com)
2. Go to Organization Settings and select/create the desired project
3. Copy the Project Key
4. Paste the Project Key within this API
